article.title: A&T Systems Receives SIPRNet Support Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: A&T Systems Incorporated, Silver Spring, Maryland, was awarded a $24,012,314 firm-fixed-price contract for the voice communications and Secret Internet Protocol Router Network Support Services for the U.S. Army Reserve Command. The Mission Contracting Office, Fort Bragg, North Carolina, is the contracting activity.
